Summary: Good, but I don't like it black at all
text: I always try my coffee straight black with no cream or sugar the first time. I did not care much for it in that form. Once I put creamer and sugar in though, it is a really good cuppa joe. I probably won't be ordering again since I don't always have cream/sugar available, but I think it is still a solid 4 star since it is so good when properly doctored up.
